instant_trade.title: âš¡ Instant Trade
instant_trade.subtitle: Quickly swap assets at the best available prices
instant_trade.hover1: Instantly trade assets on the DEX without any distractions.
instant_trade.hover2: Utilizes fill-or-kill order technology to either get the prices you want or cancels the order.
instant_trade.hover3: See who you'll be trading with on the DEX and whether they've enabled on-fill conditions on their orders.

vote.title: ğŸ—³ï¸ Voting
vote.subtitle: Vote for witnesses, committee members and worker proposals
vote.hover1: Vote for witnesses who produce blocks on the blockchain.
vote.hover2: Vote for committee members who govern the blockchain.
vote.hover3: Vote for worker proposals to fund ideas on the blockchain.

barter.title: ğŸ›’ Barter
barter.subtitle: Trade assets with other users
barter.hover2: Bartering is a peer-to-peer trading process.
barter.hover3: Bartering can involve 3rd party escrow services.

witnesses.title: ğŸ‘ï¸ Witnesses
witnesses.subtitle: View the current active and inactive witnesses.
witnesses.hover1: View who has received the most votes.
witnesses.hover2: View who witnesses have voted for.

committee.title: ğŸ—³ï¸ Committee Members
committee.subtitle: View the current active and inactive committee members.
committee.hover1: View who has received the most votes.
committee.hover2: View who committee members have voted for.

governance.title: ğŸ—³ï¸ Role Registration
governance.subtitle: Create/Update both witness and committee roles.
governance.hover1: Create, update or invalidate your witness registration.
governance.hover2: Create or update your committee member registration.

create_worker.title: ğŸ› ï¸ Create Worker Proposal
create_worker.subtitle: Create a worker proposal for funding ideas!
create_worker.hover1: Secure funds via a worker proposal to fund your project.
create_worker.hover2: Worker proposals are funded by the Bitshares reserve fund.
create_worker.hover3: Worker proposals are voted on by the community.

dex.title: ğŸ“ˆ DEX Limit Orders
dex.subtitle: Trade assets on the Bitshares DEX
dex.hover4: More complex but cheaper than pool swaps.

pool.title: ğŸ’± Liquidity Pool Exchange
pool.subtitle: Swap assets via a liquidity pool
pool.hover1: Swap assets via user created liquidity pools.
pool.hover2: Pools have different trading pairs and fees.
pool.hover3: Simpler but more costly than a limit order.

swap.title: ğŸ”„ Simple Asset Swap
swap.subtitle: More easily swap assets via pools
swap.hover1: Swap assets via user created liquidity pools.
swap.hover2: Pools have different trading pairs and fees.
swap.hover3: Simpler but more costly than a limit order.

stake.title: ğŸ”’ Stake Assets
stake.subtitle: Stake assets in liquidity pools
stake.hover1: Stake assets in liquidity pools to earn fees.
stake.hover2: Staked assets are locked in the pool.
stake.hover3: Staked assets can be withdrawn at any time.

transfer.title: ğŸ’¸ Transfer Assets
transfer.subtitle: Send assets to other users
transfer.hover1: Transfer assets to anyone on the Bitshares blockchain in seconds.

timed_transfer.title: â±ï¸ Timed Transfer
timed_transfer.subtitle: Send assets to other users at a later date.
timed_transfer.hover1: Schedule transfer of assets to another user after proposal review period passes.

htlc.title: â³ Hash Time-Locked Contracts (HTLC)
htlc.subtitle: Create claimable funds locked behind secret crypto keys.
htlc.hover1: A HTLC locks away funds for given recipient, who can redeem those funds by providing a secret preimage (password) that was used by the sender to create the contract.

create_vesting.title: ğŸ«° Vest Assets
create_vesting.subtitle: Create vesting balances
create_vesting.hover1: Creating a vesting balance allows you to lock up a quantity of assets for a set period of time.
create_vesting.hover2: You can use one of two vesting types: Coin Days Destroyed and Linear Vesting with Cliff.
create_vesting.hover3: Coin Days Destroyed policy's effect is to require a certain amount of â€œinterestâ€ to accrue before the full balance may be withdrawn, Interest accrues as coindays (balance * length held), If some of the balance is withdrawn, the remaining balance must be held longer.
create_vesting.hover4: Linear Vesting with Cliff policy is used to mimic traditional stock vesting contracts where each day a certain amount vests until it is fully matured.

borrow.title: ğŸ¦ Borrow Funds
borrow.subtitle: Borrow from other users credit offers
borrow.hover1: Browse the active user created credit offers.
borrow.hover2: Borrow assets from them at their desired rate.
borrow.hover3: Use requested collateral to secure your loan.

lend.title: ğŸª™ Lend Funds
lend.subtitle: Create a credit offer to lend to others
lend.hover1: Create your own decentralized credit offers.
lend.hover2: Lend assets at your defined rates.
lend.hover3: Specify acceptable loan collateral and prices.

smartcoins.title: ğŸ’µ Issue Collateralized debt
smartcoins.subtitle: Borrow Fiat bitassets, private smartcoins and more.
smartcoins.hover1: Bitassets like USD, CNY and EUR are committee created stablecoins (smartcoins) backed with BTS.
smartcoins.hover2: User created smartcoins can be backed with any asset and reference any external feed.
smartcoins.hover3: External settlement prices are derived from configured feed producers.
smartcoins.hover4: Exposure to external price feeds can pose a risk to collateralized debt positions.

tfunds.title: ğŸ¤– Same-T Funds
tfunds.subtitle: View, create, update, delete Same-T Funds!
tfunds.hover1: View all the Same-T Funds currently on offer by other users.
tfunds.hover2: Easily create a new Same-T fund.
tfunds.hover3: Update or delete your existing Same-T funds.
tfunds.hover4: Same-T funds are a way to earn passively from your holdings.

portfolio.subtitle: Check your balances, open orders and recent blockchain activity

portfolio_balances.subtitle: View your liquid balances and related actions
portfolio_balances.hover1: Sort balances by default, alphabetical, or amount.
portfolio_balances.hover2: Quick links to trade and asset info.

portfolio_open_orders.title: ğŸ§¾ Open Orders
portfolio_open_orders.subtitle: Review and manage your open DEX orders
portfolio_open_orders.hover1: Jump straight to the market pair.

favourites.title: â­ Your Favourites
favourites.subtitle: Quickly access favourite assets and accounts
favourites.hover1: Add assets you care about to watch them in one place.
favourites.hover2: Track your favourite accounts for quick reference.

featured.title: ğŸ† Top Markets
featured.subtitle: Discover the most actively traded assets today
featured.hover1: Navigate to the most active trading pairs.
featured.hover2: Compare market trading volume and value.

deals.title: ğŸ¤ Credit Deals
deals.subtitle: Check your credit deals
deals.hover2: Manage the state of your credit deals.

offers.title: ğŸ“œ Credit Offers
offers.subtitle: Check your credit offers
offers.hover2: Manage the state of your credit offers.

vesting.title: âŒš Vesting Balances
vesting.subtitle: View and claim rewards, referral fees and other vesting balances

prediction_markets.subtitle: Browse predictions, manage bets, perform prediction admin.

prediction_markets.hover2: Prediction markets can be about anything.
prediction_markets.hover3: Each prediction market asset has an unique fee.

proposals.title: ğŸ¤” Proposed Operations
proposals.subtitle: View and Approve/Reject Proposed Account Operations
proposals.hover1: View the proposed account operations made by other blockchain accounts for your account.
proposals.hover2: Approve or reject the proposed account operations.

issued_assets.title: ğŸ“ƒ Your Issued Assets
issued_assets.subtitle: View all the assets you've created

issued_assets.hover2: Edit the assets you've created on the blockchain.
issued_assets.hover3: Optionally issue a quantity of your created assets.

blocks.title: ğŸ’¾ Blockchain data
blocks.subtitle: View the most recent summarized blockchain data
blocks.hover1: Recent activity and recent block live data tables.
blocks.hover2: Recent block transaction count live chart.
blocks.hover3: Summarized blockchain data averages and totals.

create_prediction.title: ğŸ”® Prediction Market Asset
create_prediction.subtitle: Create a bet about anything
create_prediction.hover2: Be the bookie and set your own commission.
create_prediction.hover3: Both short and long term bets are possible.

create_uia.title: ğŸ¬ User Issued Asset
create_uia.subtitle: Create your own token for anything
create_uia.hover1: Create your own User Issued Asset.
create_uia.hover2: They can be used for a variety of purposes.
create_uia.hover3: They can be used as a token for your business, a reward token, a token for a game, and more.
create_uia.hover4: Gateways can create exchange backed assets for trading on the Bitshares DEX.

create_smartcoin.title: ğŸ’· Smartcoin Asset
create_smartcoin.subtitle: Create a Fiat stablecoin asset
create_smartcoin.hover2: They can be used for a variety of purposes.
create_smartcoin.hover3: They can be used as a stablecoin, a token for your business, a reward token, a token for a game, and more.
create_smartcoin.hover4: Smartcoins can be backed by any asset and reference any external feed.

create_liquidity_pool.title: ğŸ’§ Create Liquidity Pool
create_liquidity_pool.subtitle: Create a new liquidity pool for swapping 2 of any assets
create_liquidity_pool.hover1: Converts an user issued asset to a liquidity pool share asset.
create_liquidity_pool.hover2: Configure the liquidity pool to swap any 2 assets on the blockchain.
create_liquidity_pool.hover3: Apply your own fees to earn from others using your liquidity pool.

create_ticket.title: ğŸ« Create Ticket
create_ticket.subtitle: Create vote-lock tickets to gain vote weight.
create_ticket.hover1: Vote lock tickets grant you vote weight for witness, committee and worker voting purposes.
create_ticket.hover2: Tickets if liquidated take a set period of time before unlocking your funds.

ticket_leaderboard.subtitle: View combined effective ticket power by account
ticket_leaderboard.hover1: View who has the most voting power on the blockchain.
ticket_leaderboard.hover2: Compare how your voting power stacks up against others.
ticket_leaderboard.hover3: Calculate the size of your future vote lock tickets to gain more voting power.

accountLists.subtitle: View and manage your account lists

ltm.title: ğŸ… Upgrade Account
ltm.subtitle: Buy a lifetime membership
ltm.hover1: There are multiple benefits to becoming a lifetime member.
ltm.hover2: Lifetime members receive a 80% vesting balance rebate on fees.
ltm.hover3: Lifetime members can create premium Bitshares account names.
ltm.hover4: Lifetime members can earn through the referral system.

pay_invoice.hover1: Pay an invoice by entering the invoice code provided by the invoice creator.

stored_invoices.title: ğŸ’¾ Stored Invoices
stored_invoices.subtitle: View and manage your saved invoices

stored_invoices.hover2: View invoice details and delete unwanted invoices.
stored_invoices.hover3: Store data about the progress of invoices being fulfilled.

custom_pool_tracker.title: ğŸ“Š Liquidity Pool Tracker
custom_pool_tracker.subtitle: Track your favorite liquidity pools with ease!
custom_pool_tracker.hover1: Configure your own custom liquidity pool tracker.

pools.title: ğŸ’§ Liquidity Pools

pools.hover3: Identify liquidity pools to stake assets in.

zeroAuth.title: Zero authentication required!
zeroAuth.description: Construct your blockchain transactions without unlocking any accounts!

multiBroadcast.title: Multiple transaction broadcast methods!
multiBroadcast.description: Broadcast your blockchain operations via QR Codes, Deeplinks or local JSON files.

supportsLatest.title: Supports the latest Bitshares features!
supportsLatest.description: Interested in the latest Bitshares DEX improvements? We've got you covered!

switchChains.title: Easily switch between supported blockchains!
switchChains.description: It takes seconds to switch between Bitshares mainnet and testnet networks!

nearInstant.title: Near-instant blockchain operations!
nearInstant.description: With three second block timings your broadcast operations are verified almost instantly!

evergreen.title: Built with evergreen technologies!
evergreen.description: Using the latest web technologies for a fast, secure and reliable Bitshares future!

multiWallets.title: Supports multiple wallets!
multiWallets.description: Broadcast transactions via Beet or BeetEOS wallets!

blockActors.title: Blocks bad actors!
blockActors.description: Helps you avoid malicious accounts and their blockchain objects!

waveHero.title: A Next Generation Bitshares Client!
waveHero.subtitle: Built with the latest tech, designed for ease of use!
